content:
Two topics for our 4pm Eastern time call tomorrow. Note that the US switched off daylight savings time over the weekend, so 4pm has moved an hour earlier.

  1. Use of SNOMED codes for identifying vaccines (we believe someone from SNOMED will be joining us)
  2. Differentiating between boosters vs. initial jabs in SHCs
a small clarification for the topic title -- should say: Tues, November 9th
I'll have to miss it, would love to hear the SNOMED topic. As long as it's GPS we'll be happy! :smile:

Pascal, the representative from SNOMED, adorably and spontaneously nicknamed SNOMED Suzy, talked about a potential opportunity to create a liberally licensed VCI-specific edition/version/package? of just the terms relevant to SMART Health Cards. (I'm waiting to see if the notes help explain further).
